title: Karen Zoid   -   6 Albums
description:
Karen Zoid (born Karen Louise Greeff on 10 August 1978) is a female South African rock artist. She is also a songwriter whose lyrics have been included in Afrikaans poetry courses at Stellenbosch University and the University of Pretoria.

On 3 May 2008 she won the South African Music Awards SAMA for Best Female Solo Artist of 2008, one of the 5 most prestigious music awards in South Africa.

 <a href="
http://www.karenzoid.co.za" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
